DOC.brief_summary: Patients with hyperthyroidism and/or goiter are evaluated with blood samples and scintiscan before they are treated with radioiodine for their thyroid disease. Because the investigators do not get a histologically/final diagnosis the investigators want to make sure, that the patients treated do not have a thyroid cancer when treated. The investigators have found that thyroid cancer is not overlooked.
DOC.brief_title: The Incidence of Thyroid Cancer in 4474 Patients Treated for Hyperthyroidism or Goiter
